name: Pea in the Sea
description:
Uh oh...  you've had one too many slushies! Use  WASD or ARROW keys to move

Relief happens automatically, so stay away from any other vacationers!

You may see a black screen briefly while it is loading. Please be patient.

Game Jam Entry for Mini Jam 108: Seaside

Conjured by Iliana Pavlova & James Clark

Content warning: fluids

Sounds from https://freesound.org/
